name: sakuga

scripts.prod: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e

description: Sakuga (作画) is a personal image generation tool I built to experiment with Google's Gemini image model. The name comes from the Japanese term for animation/drawing - felt fitting for an app that creates images.
